channel.title: Need help on Compile - REWARD
channel.description: ok, my runserver works, ive downloaded the latest verson of jave and jdk, but my compiler says: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. How can i fix it? If you help me i promse ill make u admin on my server if i ever get it working. Thanks :D

item.description:
@Linksbro wrote:

Start > run > type cmd.

CMD = Command Prompt

@Linksbro wrote:

You only need to set your Environment Varibles if you don’t like setting your path manualy.

Type what I said on a regular CMD and you should be able to compile your server.

item.title: Need help on Compile - REWARD
item.dc:creator: @Linksbro Linksbro
item.description:
@Linksbro wrote:

Download any version of JDK,

Open a CMD and set your path by typing

path C:\program files\java\JDK1.6.0_07\bin;

**NOTE Insert your version of JDK in that text

Set your folder path

cd C:\Figmentscape

**NOTE Replace with what your folder path is

Your CMD should now look like,

C:\Figmentscape>

Now type,
javac *.java

This should compile, and then type,
java server

Which should run your server.

Fool Proof Compiler guide for the weak.

-Linksbro

Read full topic
